sentences.en: “The bureaucracy has been known to drag its feet in implementing directives with which it disagrees”(&b{Henry A. Kissinger})
sentences.cn: “政府机构在执行它持异议的指示时有意拖拉，这是出了名的”(&b{亨利A.基辛格})

sentences.en: A dry sandwich is a drag to eat.
sentences.cn: 放干的三明治很难吃。

sentences.en: As far as shopping for clothes goes, it's a drag.
sentences.cn: 逛街买衣服是件挺没意思的事。

sentences.en: he felt enough loyalty to his old school not to drag its name through the mud.
sentences.cn: 他对母校的忠诚足以使他不去损害她的名誉。

sentences.en: He grabbed her arm and dragged her into the room.
sentences.cn: 他抓住她的手臂把她拖进房间。

sentences.en: He hates parties; we had to drag him into going.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢参加聚会, 我们必须拉他去.

sentences.en: He took a drag on his cigarette, and exhaled the smoke.
sentences.cn: 他吸了一口烟，吐出了烟雾。

sentences.en: He was barely able to drag his poisoned leg behind him.
sentences.cn: 他极费力地拖着那条中毒的腿走路。

sentences.en: I find it really hard to drag myself out and exercise regularly.
sentences.cn: 我发现要让我自己定期出门锻炼真的很难。

sentences.en: Inge managed to drag the table into the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 英奇费了很大劲把桌子拖进厨房里。

sentences.en: It will take two elephants to drag all this wood away.
sentences.cn: 需要两头大象才能把所有的木材拖走.

sentences.en: Spending cuts will put a drag on growth.
sentences.cn: 缩减开支会减缓增长速度。

sentences.en: That seems like a horrible mess that will drag on for years.
sentences.cn: 看起来那像是个会拖延多年的大烂摊子。

sentences.en: The band dressed up in drag.
sentences.cn: 乐队的人都穿着女装。

sentences.en: The company was willing to drag out the proceedings for years.
sentences.cn: 公司愿意将诉讼拖上几年。

sentences.en: The neighborhood is given over to performers, stilt walkers and drag queens.
sentences.cn: 社区变成了玩杂耍的、踩高跷的和扮装皇后的天地。

sentences.en: The satellite acts as a drag on the shuttle.
sentences.cn: 卫星成了航天飞机的累赘。

sentences.en: There's no telling how long the talks could drag on.
sentences.cn: 谁也说不准谈判还会拖多久。

sentences.en: Use your mouse to drag the pictures to their new size.
sentences.cn: 用鼠标拖动图片，将其调整为新的尺寸。

sentences.en: would you have her dragged up by a succession of au pairs?.
sentences.cn: 难道你愿意让一个接一个的寄住妇女把她胡乱拉扯大？。

sentences.en: You can drag and drop text like this.
sentences.cn: 你可以这样拖放文本。

words.tran_cn: 拖曳等之人或物；小型拖网渔船

phrases.tran_cn: 拖延：在行动中或工作中有意延缓、拖拉
直线加速赛；短程高速赛车；减重短程高速汽车赛；街头飚车（汽车）
(英，非正式)胡乱马虎地把（孩子）拉扯大
中伤，损害，将…拖进浑水里
阻力矩；曳力矩；拖曳转矩

trans.tran_cn: 拖累，令人不快的事，吸一口，空气阻力，男扮女装
trans.tran_en: If something is a drag on the development or progress of something, it slows it down or makes it more difficult

trans.tran_cn: 拖拉，缓慢移动，拖着(脚或腿)走，(时间)过得很慢
trans.tran_en: to pull something along the ground, often because it is too heavy to carry

trans.tran_cn: 拖着脚步走，在地上拖着行进；慢吞吞地进行，拖延
trans.tran_en: to pull something along the ground, often because it is too heavy to carry
to pull something along the ground, often because it is too heavy to carry
